SHORT_DESCR.P: The assignment covers a frame agreement for digital displays. There will be 2 different categories within the frame agreement.
— Category LCD will consist of digital displays within the LCD segment for indoor and outdoor use, design and product developments fee and consultancy services,
— Category LED will consist of digital displays within the LED segment for indoor and outdoor use.
The assignment covers a frame agreement for digital displays. There will be 2 different categories within the frame agreement.
— Category LCD will consist of digital displays within the LCD segment for indoor and outdoor use, design and product developments fee and consultancy services,
— Category LED will consist of digital displays within the LED segment for indoor and outdoor use.
Swedavia intends to procure 6 number of contracts in this area as follows:
A combination of ranked and reopened competition within the 2 different categories. Up to 3 contracts will be awarded for each category.
For category LCD there will be a combination of ranked and reopened competition. For category LED there will be only contracts with reopened competition.
The aim of the procurement is to sign a contract for a period of 3 years with the possibility of an extension of up to 24 months, accordingly for a maximum of 5 years.
Contract start is anticipated to June 2018.
The value of the procurement is estimated to 50 000 000 SEK. However, Swedavia does not guarantee any volumes.

Swedavia will award a contract to the supplier whose tender is the most economically advantageous for Swedavia. Which of the tenders is the economically most advantageous will be evaluated on the basis of the price quoted, where the 3 tenders with the lowest pricing will be awarded the contract within each category.
